alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:55PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Cattaraugus, southwestern Erie and eastern Chautauqua Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1154 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Westfield to near Clymer. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Hamburg, Salamanca, Allegany State Park, Evans, Eden, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Falconer, Angola, North Collins, Jamestown West, Frewsburg, Derby, Evangola State Park, Angola on the Lake, Busti, Collins, Sheridan and New Albion. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 57A and 59. Interstate 86 between exits 11 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
